name: LightHouse Films
tag_list: video-production, video-editing, videography, production-company, video-producer, videographers, video-crews, camera-rentals
overview:
LightHouse Films is a New York based video production company and camera rental house providing high-quality video production services and video equipment rentals in Manhattan and New York.

LightHouse Films has been providing full video production services including concept development, production, editing, and post production since 2007.

LightHouse Films provides the following Video Production Services:

Art and Museums Video Services Eductional videos, Documentaries, Exhibition Teasers, Web promo videos, Artist interviews, Fundraising videos, Exhibition archives, Art event video

Commercial and Corporate Video Production Commercials, Product Demo, Testimonial Videos, Corporate Interviews, Training Videos, Events Coverage, Conference and Seminar Videotaping, Web Videos, Branding and Marketing Videos

Dance and Theater Videography Performance and events videos, Actors reel, Educational, Fundraising, Promo and Marketing videos

Fashion Video Services Runway Videos, Behind-the-scenes, Product demo, Branding, Fashion films

Music and Concert Video Production Music Videos, Concert Videos, Behind-the-Scenes Video, EPK, Live Recording Session Videos
